statements: DELETE FROM patient_health_data WHERE patient_id = 100 AND temperature > 98.6;
DELETE FROM patient_health_data WHERE activity_type = 'Walking' AND step_count < 5000;
DELETE FROM patient_health_data WHERE patient_id = 123 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM monitoring_data WHERE temperature > 100 AND oxygen_level < 95;
DELETE FROM HealthData WHERE patient_id = 2 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM heart_rate WHERE rate < 60 AND patient_id = 1;
DELETE FROM steps WHERE steps_count > 10000 AND quality = 'good';
